Speaker: A
Text: Did you hear the noise coming from the lab this morning?

Speaker: B
Text: Yeah, I thought one of the machines was malfunctioning.

Speaker: A
Text: I checked the logs, but everything looked normal.

Speaker: B
Text: That’s strange—maybe it was just the ventilation kicking on.

Speaker: A
Text: Could be, although it sounded louder than usual.

Speaker: B
Text: We should probably mention it to facilities just in case.

Speaker: A
Text: Agreed. Better to be cautious than ignore a warning sign.

Speaker: B
Text: I’ll send them a message after lunch.

Speaker: A
Text: Let me know if they want more details from us.

Speaker: B
Text: Will do. Hopefully it’s nothing serious.
